name: SuitNtie: Land
description:
Time for SuitNtie to do his daily chores! Wander the floating island and help out in doing some daily tasks in this little proof of concept.

This project sorta snowballed into what it is today. Initially it was just a character and some animations where it eventually ballooned into this small project. It took a while to get everything to work correctly but I'm happy with where it ended up :)


Controls:

GamepadKeyboard JumpA SpaceAttack XLeft MouseMovement Left Analog WASD/Arrows SprintLBLeft ShiftCrouchBCtrlRestartSelectR
